title: Limar Ultralight Evo tweaks world’s lightest bike helmet with improved durability
content:
The new Limar Ultralight Evo road helmet looks almost identical to its lightweight+ predecessor. But it’s hiding some new safety & durability upgrades inside that earn it an evolution name update. While still super light, “The World’s Lightest Helmet” tagline printed on the top of the new Ultralight Evo might not be entirely correct as […]
